dependencies.package: bash, coreutils, coreutils-bin, darwintools, system-cmds, gawk, grep, jcoz00Lib

descriptionlist.description: A fast, highly customizable system info script that supports Linux, MacOS, iOS, BSD, Solaris, Android, Haiku, GNU Hurd, MINIX, AIX and Windows (Cygwin/MSYS2/Windows 10 Linux subsystem)
